title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink-variables
author: Flibbles
name: Relink Variables
description: Reports and renames variables such as `\procedure` or `\function`
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/flibbles/tw5-relink">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/flibbles/tw5-relink"/></$button>

\rules except wikilink

Suplemental //Relink// plugins that allows for renaming of both globally defined and local variables through its own TiddlerInfo panel.
